ue4

Class Wolf

  • java.lang.Object
    • ue4.Animal
      • ue4.WildAnimal
        • ue4.Wolf

  • public class Wolf
extends WildAnimal
    The class Wolf provides wolves. It extends WildAnimal. Wolf will be raging nonstop after hunting chicken.
    Author:
    Michael Kinzkofer, Paul Jureschek

    • Constructor Detail

      • Wolf

        public Wolf(java.lang.String row,
            World world)
        Generates Wolf object. Input must be a special string containing all information. Needed to load World from file.
        Parameters:
        row - String that contains all necessary information.
        world - World object

      • Wolf

        public Wolf(Color color,
            int age,
            java.lang.String id,
            Biome currBiome,
            Nature pref,
            boolean isRaging)
        Generates Wolf object.
        Parameters:
        color - color of Wolf
        age - age of Wolf
        id - ID of Wolf
        currBiome - Biome the wolf is living on
        pref - preferred natural environment of wolf
        isRaging - whether wolf is in ragemode or not
